channel.title: sea ​​battle on Game6r
channel.description: Recent content in sea ​​battle on Game6r

item.title: Sea battle 3D game
item.description: In this game you can enjoy a real naval battle of different types of ships. Everything happens almost the same as in a sea battle, which many people play on notebook sheets. First you place the ships on the sea surface, and then you enter the battle with your opponent. Only unlike a notebook, almost three-dimensional graphics await you on the screen.
